routes: All routes must be valid and resolvable
No dummy buttons or unlinked pages
Each UI element must connect to a valid route
backend: All actions must trigger logic or mocked API
ux: Flows must match real-world use cases (auth, CRUD, etc.)
All forms must include validation and feedback
structure: Use correct routing and file structure (e.g., app/pages)
Each route must render real UI components with purpose
